publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-840 Robin Harper: Building Standards-That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Executive to declare a firm commitment to environmental criteria, footprinting, the highest possible energy conservation standards, loose fit, longlife and sustainability in the construction of all government buildings.

S1M-840 Robin Harper: Building Standards-That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Executive to declare a firm commitment to environmental criteria, footprinting, the highest possible energy conservation standards, loose fit, longlife and sustainability in the construction of all government buildings.
S1M-840 Building Standards (lodged on 10 May 2000) Michael Russell*, Kate Maclean*
S1M-840 Building Standards (lodged on 10 May 2000) Dorothy-Grace Elder*, Nora Radcliffe*

S1M-840 Robin Harper: Building Standards—That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Executive to declare a firm commitment to environmental criteria, footprinting, the highest possible energy conservation standards, loose fit, longlife and sustainability in the construction of all government buildings. Supported by: Michael Russell, Kate Maclean, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Nora Radcliffe
S1M-840 Building Standards (lodged on 10 May 2000) Andrew Wilson*
S1M-840 Building Standards (lodged on 10 May 2000) Christine Grahame*, Dr Richard Simpson*, Tavish Scott*
S1M-840 Building Standards (lodged on 10 May 2000) Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Donald Gorrie*

S1M-840 Robin Harper: Building Standards—That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Executive to declare a firm commitment to environmental criteria, footprinting, the highest possible energy conservation standards, loose fit, longlife and sustainability in the construction of all government buildings. Supported by: Michael Russell, Kate Maclean, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Nora Radcliffe, Andrew Wilson, Christine Grahame, Dr Richard Simpson, Tavish Scott, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Donald Gorrie
S1M-840 Building Standards (lodged on 10 May 2000) Mr Michael McMahon*

S1M-840 Robin Harper: Building Standards-That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Executive to declare a firm commitment to environmental criteria, footprinting, the highest possible energy conservation standards, loose fit, longlife and sustainability in the construction of all government buildings. Supported by: Michael Russell, Kate Maclean, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Nora Radcliffe, Andrew Wilson, Christine Grahame, Dr Richard Simpson, Tavish Scott, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Donald Gorrie, Mr Michael McMahon
S1M-840 Building Standards (lodged on 10 May 2000) Cathie Craigie*

S1M-840 Robin Harper: Building Standards-That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Executive to declare a firm commitment to environmental criteria, footprinting, the highest possible energy conservation standards, loose fit, longlife and sustainability in the construction of all government buildings. Supported by: Michael Russell, Kate Maclean, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Nora Radcliffe, Andrew Wilson, Christine Grahame, Dr Richard Simpson, Tavish Scott, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Donald Gorrie, Mr Michael McMahon, Cathie Craigie
S1M-840 Building Standards (lodged on 10 May 2000) Dr Sylvia Jackson*
S1M-840 Building Standards (lodged on 10 May 2000) Cathy Jamieson*

S1M-840 Robin Harper: Building Standards—That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Executive to declare a firm commitment to environmental criteria, footprinting, the highest possible energy conservation standards, loose fit, longlife and sustainability in the construction of all government buildings.
